      • createReservation

        public int createReservation(Customer customer,
                    Calendar dateTime,
                    Table table,
                    int numPeople)
        must do checkExpiry before allocateTable!
        Parameters:
        customer - Customer Object, details of who made the reservation, from app dateTime Calendar Object, date and time for reservation, from app numPeople number of people that will be allocated to table, from app table Table Object, table that will be allocated for the reservation, from app that calls TableManager.allocateTable
